question: What does a "bank" means in Payment and Settlement Systems Act, 2007, unless the context otherwise requires?
option1: a bank included in the Second Schedule to the RBI Act
option3: a banking company as defined in clause c of section 5, of the Banking Regulation Act
explanation: In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires, “bank” means, a bank included in the Second Schedule to the Reserve Bank of India Act, 1934; a post office savings bank; a banking company as defined in clause (c) of section 5, of the Banking Regulation Act, 1949; a co-operative bank as defined in clause of section 5 of the Banking Regulation Act, 1949.
